npcs.name: Lady Selara Astralor
npcs.description: An Arkan with luminous deep blue eyes and chitinous silver-white skin. Slender and graceful, Lady Selara’s warmth and empathy stand in place of martial prowess. She is betrothed to Marik Veltaris-Falkrest, offering her heartfelt support from the sidelines rather than on the battlefield. As a devoted follower of Serenya and Seraphis, her healing talents extend beyond traditional magic—she has pioneered a new method of blending Ryanite with living tissue to create bio-enhanced prosthetics.
npcs.quote: Peace is not surrender; it is the choice to heal rather than to harm, even when the world tempts you otherwise.

npcs.name: Raynere Falkrest, Lord of Skyhaven and Lord Paramount of House Falkrest
npcs.description: A bronze dragonborn of 95 years, Raynere serves on the King’s Council as the Sentinel of Ederia—charged with defending the realm against monstrous and extraplanar threats. Adopted into House Falkrest after his valor in The Night of Crimson Tears, he transformed Skyhaven into a fortified bastion of security. Though stern in command, he warms any gathering with good humor once duty allows, endearing him to nobles and commoners alike.
npcs.quote: Strength is not just in battle; it’s in the choices we make to protect what we hold dear.

npcs.name: Elandor Veythryn, the Revenant Flamebringer
npcs.description: A solemn, undead knight once bound to serve King Alistar Draven, Elandor broke free when the tyrant fell. Driven by guilt over his forced atrocities, he now leads the Church of the Cleansing Tempest with unwavering zeal, intent on eradicating the Crimson Court’s remaining corruption. Though he carries himself with measured restraint, his words burn with the fervor of a man compelled to redeem himself in the eyes of the realm he once harmed.
npcs.quote: Though death chains me to my past, I live on to end the evil I once had no choice but to serve.

npcs.name: Lady Alarice Eldran, Chancellor of the Treasury
npcs.description: A half-elven noble with striking silver hair and bright green eyes, Lady Alarice Eldran carries herself with unwavering poise and integrity. Entrusted by King Talon to oversee the kingdom’s finances, she expertly balances the flow of gold and silver, ensuring Ederia’s economic lifeblood remains strong. Her approach to governance is as refined as her attire—practical, elegant, and meticulously organized. Though rarely one for public fanfare, her sage advice and sharp mind for numbers have made her indispensable in maintaining Ederia’s prosperity.
npcs.quote: Wealth is not merely gold and silver, but the lifeblood of our kingdom. It must flow wisely and justly, or we risk bleeding ourselves dry.

npcs.name: Archmage Morgana Umbren
npcs.description: A tiefling of deep purple skin and sharp horns, Morgana Umbren commands attention in her flowing, symbol-embroidered robes. Despite her renown as a necromancer, King Talon entrusts her with oversight of all magical affairs—a testament to her profound understanding of arcane arts. She moves with measured grace, her piercing violet eyes reflecting both caution and curiosity. Equal parts scholar and sorcerer, Morgana maintains strict vigilance over Ederia’s magical landscape, ever mindful of the delicate balance between ambition and responsibility.
npcs.quote: Magic is a double-edged sword. Wield it with wisdom, for its power can either protect or consume.

npcs.name: Lady Elyndra Maelis, Envoy General
npcs.description: A refined diplomat with flowing auburn hair that subtly shifts through seasonal hues, Elyndra Maelis carries herself with understated grace. Her kind blue eyes and warm smile disarm even the staunchest critics. Raised under Queen Elendara’s tutelage, she earned King Talon’s trust through years of loyal service and adept negotiations—proving that quiet resolve and gentle words can be as potent as any sword. Although Talon distrusts House Veltris, Elyndra’s steadfast loyalty and skilled diplomacy make her an essential voice in the royal court.
npcs.quote: I always start with flowers and pleasantries, not because I am weak, but because the old guard underestimates a kind woman.

npcs.name: Ser Davion Thalon, Spymaster
npcs.description: A small, wiry figure with dark hair and piercing blue eyes, Ser Davion blends seamlessly into his surroundings. Quiet yet observant, he dresses in the subdued hues of his monastic order—a reflection of both humility and tactical discretion. Though rarely in the spotlight, his keen intellect and unshakable loyalty to the crown make him the realm’s most reliable gatherer of secrets. Few individuals truly know him, but many respect the silent power he wields through whispered confessions and subtle investigations.
npcs.quote: Pilgrims and penitents alike are ever willing to divulge their darkest secrets to strangers and members of the cloth. In these whispered confessions, the true pulse of the kingdom is revealed.

npcs.name: Mayor Brynden Goodbrook
npcs.description: For a decade, this halfling has been a steady voice of kindness in the Lowlands, navigating the delicate balance between the surrounding noble houses. Though small in stature, their measured words and quiet diplomacy have kept Rosemont a neutral ground amidst shifting alliances.
npcs.quote: I do hope you can resolve this unpleasant business between House Melanth and House Rivermoor soon and with minimal strife—our people not only grow uneasy when lords quarrel but we tend to be the ones who suffer.

npcs.name: Ser Otis Von Phem, Burgrave of Gildarrow Keep
npcs.description: A grizzled veteran with iron-gray hair, Ser Otis stands at rigid attention in a deep blue and purple surcoat bearing an embroidered silver antelope. Known for his unflinching discipline and tactical mind, he earned the crown’s ear by championing an expanded Ederian Watch. Beneath his stern demeanor lies an unwavering devotion to protecting the realm’s common folk—an ideal that drives both his speechcraft and his sword arm.
npcs.quote: What good is a crown that cannot protect its people?
